oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A qualocation method for Burgers' equation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MANTRI, PS
NATARAJ, N
PANI, AK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: collocation method
qualocation method
burgers' equation
optimal error estimates
gauss quadrature rule
order of convergence
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper, a qualocation method for the one-dimensional Burgers' equation is proposed. A semidiscrete scheme along with optimal error estimates is discussed. Results of a numerical experiment performed support the theoretical results. (c) 2007
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF COMPUTATIONAL AND APPLIED MATHEMATICS, 213(1), 1-13
